      • AuthenticateCostumer

        public Costumer AuthenticateCostumer(java.lang.String userName)
        + Retrieves the costumer with the username provided so the costumer can be authenticated
        Parameters:
        userName - Username of the costumer trying to log in
        Returns:
        The costumer associated with the username provided or null if there is no such costumer

        Returns:

      • ExistingCostumer

        public boolean ExistingCostumer(int ssn)
        + Determines if there is already a costumer with the ssn provided
        Parameters:
        ssn - Social Security Number of the costumer trying to create a profile
        Returns:
        true if there is already a costumer associated with this social security number. false otherwise

      • OpenDepositAccount

        public AccountAction OpenDepositAccount(Costumer costumer,
                                        java.lang.String type,
                                        double initialDeposit)
        + Opens an account of type {Checking or Savings} belonging to {costumer} starting with {initialDeposit}
        Parameters:
        costumer - Owner of the account
        type - Type of account to be opened {Checking or Savings}
        initialDeposit - Initial Deposit
        Returns:
        AccountAction with success status and the account number of the new account.

      • OpenCreditLineAccount

        public AccountAction OpenCreditLineAccount(Costumer owner,
                                           double creditLimit,
                                           double interest)
        + Opens an line of credit account belonging to {costumer} with credit limit {creditLimit} and interest rate {interest}
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the account
        creditLimit - Credit limit of the account
        interest - Interest rate of the account
        Returns:
        AccountAction with success status and the account number of the new account.

      • GetAccount

        public Account GetAccount(int accountNumber)
        + Retrieves an account from the database
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - Account number of the account needed from the database
        Returns:
        The Account associated with the provided account number

      • LoanApprovalTool

        public AccountAction LoanApprovalTool(Costumer costumer)
        + Approval Tool for Loan Accounts
        Parameters:
        costumer - Costumer applying for the loan
        Returns:
        AccountAction with information about the decision and the interest rate in case of approval. Loan can be denied due to poor credit, instantly approved or sent to review.
